com.aj.android.commons.io

Class FileUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aj.android.commons.io.FileUtils

  • public class FileUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Collection of File related utilities for reading, writing files.
    and other directory related operations.
    Author:
    Akhil Jain

      • getFileCount

        public static int getFileCount(java.lang.String directoryPath,
                               boolean countDirectory)
        String directory path where the number of files are to be counted.
        Parameters:
        directoryPath - -String directory path.
        countDirectory - -boolean, if set to true will count directory also, else not.
        Returns:
        int -number of files and directories(if included) found in given directory path.

      • getRecursiveFileCount

        public static int getRecursiveFileCount(java.lang.String directoryPath,
                                        boolean countDirectory)
        Counts the number of file present in directory and sub-directory in the given String directory path.
        Parameters:
        directoryPath - -String directory path.
        countDirectory - -boolean, if set to true will count directory also, else not.
        Returns:
        int -number of files and directories(if included) found in given directory and sub-directory.

      • getDirectorySize

        public static long getDirectorySize(java.lang.String directoryPath,
                                    boolean countDirectory)
        Physical size of directory in terms of bytes.
        Parameters:
        directoryPath - -String directory path.
        countDirectory - -boolean, if set to true will count size of sub-directory also, else not.
        Returns:
        long -size of directory in terms of bytes.

      • getFileName

        public static java.lang.String getFileName(java.lang.String filePath)
        Get file name from path, include suffix. 
              getFileName(null)               =   null
      getFileName("")                 =   ""
      getFileName("   ")              =   "   "
      getFileName("a.mp3")            =   "a.mp3"
      getFileName("a.b.rmvb")         =   "a.b.rmvb"
      getFileName("abc")              =   "abc"
      getFileName("c:\\")              =   ""
      getFileName("c:\\a")             =   "a"
      getFileName("c:\\a.b")           =   "a.b"
      getFileName("c:a.txt\\a")        =   "a"
      getFileName("/home/admin")      =   "admin"
      getFileName("/home/admin/a.txt/b.mp3")  =   "b.mp3"
        Parameters:
        filePath -
        Returns:
        file name from path, include suffix

      • getFolderName

        public static java.lang.String getFolderName(java.lang.String filePath)
        get folder name from path 

              getFolderName(null)               =   null
      getFolderName("")                 =   ""
      getFolderName("   ")              =   ""
      getFolderName("a.mp3")            =   ""
      getFolderName("a.b.rmvb")         =   ""
      getFolderName("abc")              =   ""
      getFolderName("c:\\")              =   "c:"
      getFolderName("c:\\a")             =   "c:"
      getFolderName("c:\\a.b")           =   "c:"
      getFolderName("c:a.txt\\a")        =   "c:a.txt"
      getFolderName("c:a\\b\\c\\d.txt")    =   "c:a\\b\\c"
      getFolderName("/home/admin")      =   "/home"
      getFolderName("/home/admin/a.txt/b.mp3")  =   "/home/admin/a.txt"
        Parameters:
        filePath -
        Returns:

      • getFileExtension

        public static java.lang.String getFileExtension(java.lang.String filePath)
        get suffix of file from path 

              getFileExtension(null)               =   ""
      getFileExtension("")                 =   ""
      getFileExtension("   ")              =   "   "
      getFileExtension("a.mp3")            =   "mp3"
      getFileExtension("a.b.rmvb")         =   "rmvb"
      getFileExtension("abc")              =   ""
      getFileExtension("c:\\")              =   ""
      getFileExtension("c:\\a")             =   ""
      getFileExtension("c:\\a.b")           =   "b"
      getFileExtension("c:a.txt\\a")        =   ""
      getFileExtension("/home/admin")      =   ""
      getFileExtension("/home/admin/a.txt/b")  =   ""
      getFileExtension("/home/admin/a.txt/b.mp3")  =   "mp3"
        Parameters:
        filePath -
        Returns:

      • getFileNameWithoutExtension

        public static java.lang.String getFileNameWithoutExtension(java.lang.String filePath)
        get file name from path, not include suffix 
              getFileNameWithoutExtension(null)               =   null
      getFileNameWithoutExtension("")                 =   ""
      getFileNameWithoutExtension("   ")              =   "   "
      getFileNameWithoutExtension("abc")              =   "abc"
      getFileNameWithoutExtension("a.mp3")            =   "a"
      getFileNameWithoutExtension("a.b.rmvb")         =   "a.b"
      getFileNameWithoutExtension("c:\\")              =   ""
      getFileNameWithoutExtension("c:\\a")             =   "a"
      getFileNameWithoutExtension("c:\\a.b")           =   "a"
      getFileNameWithoutExtension("c:a.txt\\a")        =   "a"
      getFileNameWithoutExtension("/home/admin")      =   "admin"
      getFileNameWithoutExtension("/home/admin/a.txt/b.mp3")  =   "b"
        Parameters:
        filePath -
        Returns:
        file name from path, not include suffix

        Gets Mime type for the file.
        Internally calls MimeTypeMap#getExtensionFromMimeType(String)
        Parameters:
        file - -File object.
        Returns:
        String mime extension for file.

        Parameters:

      • readFileToList

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> readFileToList(java.lang.String filePath,
                                                              java.lang.String charsetName)
        Read file to string list, a element of list is a line
        Parameters:
        filePath -
        charsetName - The name of a supported charset
        Returns:
        if file not exist, return null, else return content of file
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if an error occurs while operator BufferedReader

      • formatFileSize

        public static java.lang.String formatFileSize(java.lang.String filePath)
        Gets the file size in formatted way.

        Internally calls formatFileSize(long).
        Parameters:
        filePath - -String physical file system absolute path for file.
        Returns:
        String - human readable form of file size.

      • formatFileSize

        public static java.lang.String formatFileSize(long size)
        Formats the long byte size into human readable form in terms of bytes,KB,MB and more.
        Parameters:
        size - -long, size that needs to be converted.
        Returns:
        String - human readable form of given size.

      • writeStream

        public static boolean writeStream(java.lang.String filePath,
                                  java.io.InputStream stream,
                                  boolean append)
                           throws java.io.IOException
        write file
        Parameters:
        file - the file to be opened for writing.
        stream - the input stream
        append - if true, then bytes will be written to the end of the file rather than the beginning
        Returns:
        return true
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an error occurs while operator FileOutputStream

      • writeStringToFile

        public static boolean writeStringToFile(java.io.File file,
                                        java.lang.String content,
                                        boolean append)
                                 throws java.io.IOException
        write file, also creates directory if not exist
        Parameters:
        filePath -
        content -
        append - is append, if true, write to the end of file, else clear content of file and write into it
        Returns:
        return false if content is empty, true otherwise
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if an error occurs while operator FileWriter
        java.io.IOException

        Parameters:
        filePath -
        contentList -
        append - is append, if true, write to the end of file, else clear content of file and write into it
        Returns:
        return false if contentList is empty, true otherwise
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if an error occurs while operator FileWriter

      • deleteViaShell

        public static boolean deleteViaShell(java.lang.String path,
                                     boolean recursive)
                              throws java.io.IOException
        Deletes the file or directory at the given path using the rm shell command.
        Parameters:
        path - Path to the file to delete.
        recursive - True to do the delete recursively, else false.
        Returns:
        True if the file existed and was deleted, or false if it didn't exist.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the shell execution fails.

      • deleteViaShell

        public static boolean deleteViaShell(java.io.File file,
                                     boolean recursive)
                              throws java.io.IOException
        Deletes the file or directory at the given path using the rm shell command.
        Parameters:
        file - The File to delete.
        recursive - True to do the delete recursively, else false.
        Returns:
        True if the file existed and was deleted, or false if it didn't exist.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the shell execution fails.
